skill.name: frontend-design
skill.description: Create distinctive, production-grade frontend interfaces with high design quality. Use this skill when the user asks to build web components, pages, artifacts, posters, or applications (examples include websites, landing pages, dashboards, React components, HTML/CSS layouts, or when styling/beautifying any web UI). Generates creative, polished code and UI design that avoids generic AI aesthetics.
skill.summary: Create distinctive, production-grade frontend interfaces with high design quality. Use this skill wh...
skill.author: anthropics

security_audit.summary: This is an official Anthropic skill containing only design guidelines and aesthetic instructions. The skill has no executable code, no external network access, and no file system operations. It provides pure prompt-based guidance for frontend UI creation.

content.user_title: Build Stunning Frontend Interfaces with Unique Design
content.value_statement: Generic AI-generated interfaces look the same and lack personality. This skill guides you to create distinctive, production-ready frontends with bold aesthetics and meticulous attention to detail.
actual_capabilities: Generate HTML, CSS, and JavaScript code for complete web interfaces
Create React, Vue, or vanilla JS components with production-ready code
Apply distinctive typography, color schemes, and spatial compositions
Add animations and micro-interactions using CSS or Motion library
Build landing pages, dashboards, and application interfaces
Avoid generic AI aesthetics by using bold, intentional design choices
limitations: Does not create backend logic or database connections
Cannot access external design files or Figma imports
Requires manual integration with existing build systems
Font availability depends on user's project setup

use_cases.title: Create a Memorable Landing Page
use_cases.description: Build a visually striking landing page that stands out from competitors. Features bold typography and custom animations.

use_cases.title: Design Dashboard Components
use_cases.description: Generate polished React components for admin dashboards with cohesive themes, hover states, and smooth transitions.

use_cases.title: Style a Personal Portfolio
use_cases.description: Create a unique portfolio site that reflects your personality. Choose from minimalist elegance to maximalist creativity.

prompt_templates.title: Basic Component
prompt_templates.prompt: Build a pricing card component with three tiers. Use a dark theme with neon accents and smooth hover animations.

prompt_templates.title: Landing Page
prompt_templates.prompt: Create a landing page for a coffee subscription service. Use warm earth tones, editorial typography, and subtle parallax scrolling.

prompt_templates.title: Dashboard Layout
prompt_templates.prompt: Build a crypto trading dashboard with real-time data displays. Use a brutalist aesthetic with sharp contrasts and industrial typography.

prompt_templates.title: Creative Experiment
prompt_templates.prompt: Create an experimental portfolio page for a digital artist. Break conventional layouts. Use asymmetry, overlapping elements, and unexpected interactions.

output_examples.input: Build a hero section for a tech startup landing page
output: Complete HTML structure with semantic markup
CSS with custom properties for theme colors and spacing
Distinctive typography pairing with display and body fonts
Animated gradient background with mesh effects
Staggered text reveal animations on page load
Responsive design for mobile and desktop views

best_practices: Provide context about your target audience and brand personality for better design direction
Specify technical constraints like framework choice or browser support requirements upfront
Request a specific aesthetic direction such as minimalist, brutalist, or retro-futuristic
anti_patterns: Avoid vague requests like 'make it look good' without providing design context or preferences
Do not expect backend functionality or API integrations from this design-focused skill
Avoid requesting generic designs that look like every other AI-generated interface

faq.question: What frameworks does this skill support?
faq.answer: This skill generates code for React, Vue, vanilla HTML/CSS/JS, and other frontend frameworks. Specify your preferred framework in the prompt.

faq.question: Can I use the generated code in commercial projects?
faq.answer: Yes. The generated code is yours to use. Note that external fonts or assets may have separate license requirements.

faq.question: How do I get animations to work?
faq.answer: CSS animations work immediately. For React projects, the skill may use the Motion library which requires npm installation.

faq.question: Why does my design look different from the description?
faq.answer: Font availability affects the final look. Install recommended fonts or provide alternatives in your project setup.

faq.question: Can this skill recreate a specific design from an image?
faq.answer: This skill creates original designs based on descriptions. For image-based recreation, provide detailed written specifications.

faq.question: How do I request a specific aesthetic style?
faq.answer: Name the style directly: brutalist, minimalist, art deco, retro-futuristic, organic, or editorial. Add reference descriptions for clarity.
